sentence.Network_en: The curio shop backs the post office.
sentence.Network_cn: 古玩店位于邮局的后面.

sentence.Network_en: This set of glass curio was made with the latest technology.
sentence.Network_cn: 这套玻璃古玩是用最新工艺制作的.

sentence.Network_en: There was a silence then that filled the little curio shop.
sentence.Network_cn: 接着这个小古董店变得一片寂静.

entry.def: A curio is an object such as a small ornament which is unusual and fairly rare.

means.word_mean: 1. something unusual -- perhaps worthy of collecting

auth_sentence.content: More casual fans of both, consider it a playlist-topping curio.
auth_sentence.res_content: More casual fans of both, consider it a playlist-topping curio.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: More casual fans of both, consider it a playlist-topping curio.

auth_sentence.content: This fragrance emporium has gorgeous marble floors and precious curio cabinets.
auth_sentence.res_content: This fragrance emporium has gorgeous marble floors and precious curio cabinets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This fragrance emporium has gorgeous marble floors and precious curio cabinets.

auth_sentence.content: Paused in front of the curio shop to admire the little fringed souvenirs.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =run,表示"跑,发生,快速做……"; 2. =care,表示"关心"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 正确无误的;准确的,精确的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ac再+cur关心+ate……的→再关心,弄精确为止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 好奇的, 求知的, 古怪的, 爱挑剔的

stems_affixes.word_buile: accurate[[adj.正确无误的;准确的,精确的]]→n.准确[性];精确;准确度
cur关心+io→珍贵的被人多加关心的东西
cur关心+iosity多……的状态→关心多→好奇心
con共同+cur跑,发生,快速做……→共同跑→共同发生
in进入+cur跑,发生,快速做……→跑进来→招惹

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发生,出现;存在;想起,想到
stems_affixes.word_buile: oc向+cur跑,发生,快速做……→某个方向跑,发生

stems_affixes.value_cn: [尤指不好的事]一再发生;重现
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再次+cur跑,发生,快速做……→再次跑来
